name: Dragon Battle: Shadow Warriors
description:
Have you ever thing a war infinite about the most powerful superheroes of the galaxy? Do not miss the opportunity to become the strongest. Win all shadow battle and proving your strength. You can only become the strongest when defeating the other strong. Become a shadow hero and using their special skills to win in the shadow war infinite.

You will have to fight against the senior managers of the shadow battle. Each manager owns a ball dragon and you will have them when you win all the battle. Collect enough seven ball in battle of ball, you will become the champion of shadow war. Instinct is ultra limit. Fight to awaken your Ultra Instinct. You can only achieve this by challenging yourself.

Feautures:

- Special shadow fighting styles: Each character have a special skills. You can learning and understanding their skill's to fight better.
- System animation awesome: kicking, punching, catching, throwing, and dodge... Combine these fighting skills to create a variety of deadly attacks.
- 30 amazing shadow warriors and update regularly.
